verses.verse: If <S%H3588><s%> there arise <S%H6965><s%> among <S%H7130><s%> you a prophet, <S%H5030><s%> or <S%H176><s%> a dreamer <S%H2492><s%> of dreams, <S%H2472><s%> and giveth <S%H5414><s%> <S%H413><s%> thee a sign <S%H226><s%> or <S%H176><s%> a wonder, <S%H4159><s%>

And the sign <S%H226><s%> or the wonder <S%H4159><s%> come to pass, <S%H935><s%> whereof <S%H834><s%> he spoke <S%H1696><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> thee, saying, <S%H559><s%> Let us go <S%H1980><s%> after <S%H310><s%> other <S%H312><s%> gods, <S%H430><s%> which <S%H834><s%> thou hast not <S%H3808><s%> known, <S%H3045><s%> and let us serve <S%H5647><s%> them;

Thou shalt not <S%H3808><s%> hearken <S%H8085><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> the words <S%H1697><s%> of that <S%H1931><s%> prophet, <S%H5030><s%> or <S%H176><s%> that <S%H1931><s%> dreamer <S%H2492><s%> of dreams: <S%H2472><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> proveth <S%H5254><s%> you, to know <S%H3045><s%> whether <S%H3426><s%> ye love <S%H157><s%> <S%H853><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> with all <S%H3605><s%> your heart <S%H3824><s%> and with all <S%H3605><s%> your soul. <S%H5315><s%>

Ye shall walk <S%H1980><s%> after <S%H310><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> your God, <S%H430><s%> and fear <S%H3372><s%> him, and keep <S%H8104><s%> his commandments, <S%H4687><s%> and obey <S%H8085><s%> his voice, <S%H6963><s%> and ye shall serve <S%H5647><s%> him, and cleave <S%H1692><s%> unto him.

And that <S%H1931><s%> prophet, <S%H5030><s%> or <S%H176><s%> that <S%H1931><s%> dreamer <S%H2492><s%> of dreams, <S%H2472><s%> shall be put to death; <S%H4191><s%> because <S%H3588><s%> he hath spoken <S%H1696><s%> to turn you away <S%H5627><s%> from <S%H5921><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> your God, <S%H430><s%> which brought you out <S%H3318><s%> <S%H853><s%> of the land <S%H4480><s%> <S%H776><s%> of Egypt, <S%H4714><s%> and redeemed <S%H6299><s%> you out of the house <S%H4480><s%> <S%H1004><s%> of bondage, <S%H5650><s%> to thrust <S%H5080><s%> thee out of <S%H4480><s%> the way <S%H1870><s%> which <S%H834><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> thy God <S%H430><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> thee to walk <S%H1980><s%> in. So shalt thou put the evil away <S%H1197><s%> <S%H7451><s%> from the midst <S%H4480><s%> <S%H7130><s%> of thee.

If <S%H3588><s%> thy brother, <S%H251><s%> the son <S%H121><s%> of thy mother, <S%H517><s%> or <S%H176><s%> thy son, <S%H1121><s%> or <S%H176><s%> thy daughter, <S%H1323><s%> or <S%H176><s%> the wife <S%H802><s%> of thy bosom, <S%H2436><s%> or <S%H176><s%> thy friend, <S%H7453><s%> which <S%H834><s%> is as thine own soul, <S%H5315><s%> entice <S%H5496><s%> thee secretly, <S%H5643><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> Let us go <S%H1980><s%> and serve <S%H5647><s%> other <S%H312><s%> gods, <S%H430><s%> which <S%H834><s%> thou hast not <S%H3808><s%> known, <S%H3045><s%> thou, <S%H859><s%> nor thy fathers; <S%H1><s%>

Namely, of the gods <S%H4480><s%> <S%H430><s%> of the people <S%H5971><s%> which <S%H834><s%> are round about <S%H5439><s%> you, nigh <S%H7138><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> thee, or <S%H176><s%> far off <S%H7350><s%> from <S%H4480><s%> thee, from the one end <S%H4480><s%> <S%H7097><s%> of the earth <S%H776><s%> even unto <S%H5704><s%> the other end <S%H7097><s%> of the earth; <S%H776><s%>

Thou shalt not <S%H3808><s%> consent <S%H14><s%> unto him, nor <S%H3808><s%> hearken <S%H8085><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> him; neither <S%H3808><s%> shall thine eye <S%H5869><s%> pity <S%H2347><s%> <S%H5921><s%> him, neither <S%H3808><s%> shalt thou spare, <S%H2550><s%> neither <S%H3808><s%> shalt thou conceal <S%H3680><s%> <S%H5921><s%> him:

But <S%H3588><s%> thou shalt surely kill <S%H2026><s%> <S%H2026><s%> him; thine hand <S%H3027><s%> shall be <S%H1961><s%> first <S%H7223><s%> upon him to put him to death, <S%H4191><s%> and afterwards <S%H314><s%> the hand <S%H3027><s%> of all <S%H3605><s%> the people. <S%H5971><s%>

And thou shalt stone <S%H5619><s%> him with stones, <S%H68><s%> that he die; <S%H4191><s%> because <S%H3588><s%> he hath sought <S%H1245><s%> to thrust thee away <S%H5080><s%> from <S%H4480><s%> <S%H5921><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> thy God, <S%H430><s%> which brought thee out <S%H3318><s%> of the land <S%H4480><s%> <S%H776><s%> of Egypt, <S%H4714><s%> from the house <S%H4480><s%> <S%H1004><s%> of bondage. <S%H5650><s%>

And all <S%H3605><s%> Israel <S%H3478><s%> shall hear, <S%H8085><s%> and fear, <S%H3372><s%> and shall do <S%H6213><s%> no <S%H3808><s%> more <S%H3254><s%> any <S%H1697><s%> such wickedness <S%H7451><s%> as this <S%H2088><s%> is among <S%H7130><s%> you.

If <S%H3588><s%> thou shalt hear <S%H8085><s%> say in one <S%H259><s%> of thy cities, <S%H5892><s%> which <S%H834><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> thy God <S%H430><s%> hath given <S%H5414><s%> thee to dwell <S%H3427><s%> there, <S%H8033><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%>

Certain men, <S%H376><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Belial, <S%H1100><s%> are gone out <S%H3318><s%> from among <S%H4480><s%> <S%H7130><s%> you, and have withdrawn <S%H5080><s%> <S%H853><s%> the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> of their city, <S%H5892><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> Let us go <S%H1980><s%> and serve <S%H5647><s%> other <S%H312><s%> gods, <S%H430><s%> which <S%H834><s%> ye have not <S%H3808><s%> known; <S%H3045><s%>

Then shalt thou inquire, <S%H1875><s%> and make search, <S%H2713><s%> and ask <S%H7592><s%> diligently; <S%H3190><s%> and, behold, <S%H2009><s%> if it be truth, <S%H571><s%> and the thing <S%H1697><s%> certain, <S%H3559><s%> that such <S%H2063><s%> abomination <S%H8441><s%> is wrought <S%H6213><s%> among <S%H7130><s%> you;

Thou shalt surely smite <S%H5221><s%> <S%H5221><s%> <S%H853><s%> the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> of that <S%H1931><s%> city <S%H5892><s%> with the edge <S%H6310><s%> of the sword, <S%H2719><s%> destroying it utterly, <S%H2763><s%> <S%H853><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> that <S%H834><s%> is therein, and the cattle <S%H929><s%> thereof, with the edge <S%H6310><s%> of the sword. <S%H2719><s%>

And thou shalt gather <S%H6908><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the spoil <S%H7998><s%> of it into <S%H413><s%> the midst <S%H8432><s%> of the street <S%H7339><s%> thereof, and shalt burn <S%H8313><s%> with fire <S%H784><s%> <S%H853><s%> the city, <S%H5892><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> the spoil <S%H7998><s%> thereof every whit, <S%H3632><s%> for the LORD <S%H3068><s%> thy God: <S%H430><s%> and it shall be <S%H1961><s%> a heap <S%H8510><s%> forever; <S%H5769><s%> it shall not <S%H3808><s%> be built <S%H1129><s%> again. <S%H5750><s%>

And there shall cleave <S%H1692><s%> naught <S%H3808><s%> <S%H3972><s%> of <S%H4480><s%> the cursed thing <S%H2764><s%> to thine hand: <S%H3027><s%> that <S%H4616><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> may turn <S%H7725><s%> from the fierceness <S%H4480><s%> <S%H2740><s%> of his anger, <S%H639><s%> and show <S%H5414><s%> thee mercy, <S%H7356><s%> and have compassion <S%H7355><s%> upon thee, and multiply <S%H7235><s%> thee, as <S%H834><s%> he hath sworn <S%H7650><s%> unto thy fathers; <S%H1><s%>

When <S%H3588><s%> thou shalt hearken <S%H8085><s%> to the voice <S%H6963><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> thy God, <S%H430><s%> to keep <S%H8104><s%> <S%H853><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> his commandments <S%H4687><s%> which <S%H834><s%> I <S%H595><s%> command <S%H6680><s%> thee this day, <S%H3117><s%> to do <S%H6213><s%> that which is right <S%H3477><s%> in the eyes <S%H5869><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> thy God. <S%H430><s%>
